title: Lord Deliver Me From Negative Self Talk 2: Christian Self-Help Book For Women Struggling With Negative Self-Talk, Over-Thinking, And Building Self-Confidence ... World
description: Charm is deceptive, and beauty is fleeting; but a woman who fears the LORD is to be praised.(Proverbs 31:30) You are more than good enough just the way you are. Motivation for women on the move in the Kingdom of God. Self Talk 2 is a great women's devotional book for improving self-esteem and getting rid of negative self talk. Start your day fresh by using these short devotions as morning inspiration on a daily basis. As Women of God, we have tremendous influence in the home; corporate world; the church; and society as a whole. But some how we have begun to fall victim to negative thinking and low self image.Scroll up, click on "Buy Now with 1-Click", and Get Your Copy Instantly!
author: Lynn R. Davis
